name: getstatsbyyear
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trinidad_covid_19_statistics.
Tool description: This API provides Covid-19 statistics by year, month, day and most recent day in Trinidad and Tobago
API description: This endpoint delivers Trinidad & Tobago Covid 19 statistics by year. For a valid response, the beginning year is 2020 and the latest year is the current year.

is_id.description: The year for which the Covid-19 statistics are being requested. Must be between 2020 and the current year.
